resources.string: Java Quizz

Oh so close!
You got it!
In an instance method or a constructor, "this" is a reference to the current object.
Garbage Collection is manual process.
Approximately one quarter of human bones are in the feet.
Variable name can begin with a letter, "$", or "_".
In West Virginia, USA, if you accidentally hit an animal with your car, you are free to take it home to eat.
In London, UK, if you happen to die in the House of Parliament, you are technically entitled to a state funeral, because the building is considered too sacred a place.
James Gosling is father of Java?
Java technology is both a programming language and a platform.
Google was originally called \"Backrub\".
The modifiers public and static cannot written in either order "public static" or "static public".
Java programming is not statically-typed, means all variables should not first be declared before they can be used.
Declarations must appear at the start of the body of a Java method.
An individual array element from an array of type int, when passed to a method is passed by value.
Objects of a subclass can be assigned to a super class reference.
